title: Is it possible to have stable ping if transferred from NA to OCE
body: Yeah so I’m probably gonna get diamond and I wanna transfer to NA so I can matchmake with pokimane and whoop her ass (I’m whipped) yeah so I’m wondering if the ping will be stable and if not is there a loophole around it? Cheers

replies.body:
You could get 180-190 with good internet on a good day.  It may be 10-20ms more now the server has moved from California to the centre of the US.  It's playable, but don't expect to have the sort of rank that you might get here, expecially in a mechanically intensive position.  It was hardly worth trying to dodge most skillshots with that ping.


...Thanks for OCE server RIOT.

So I heard but never tried before I transferred to oce but theres this link (check tilteralla) I think its Haste, that gives a better connection to NA servers but I havent tried it since before so I hope it helps.
if you transfer to NA from oce you'll have a min of like 240 ping, also you're p5 650 games played... saying yeah so im probably gonna get diamond is very far fetched.

if there is a large distance, then you will get the standard amount of ping for the data traveling around the world (which was around 200 ping years ago when we didn't have an OCE server.)

There is no way around having a large distance there, unless you can move.
